name: VZVirtualMachineConfiguration
desc: The environment attributes and list of devices to use during the configuration of macOS or Linux VMs.

items.name: var bootLoader: VZBootLoader?
items.desc: The guest system to boot when the VM starts.

items.name: var cpuCount: Int
items.desc: The number of CPUs you make available to the guest operating system.

items.name: class var minimumAllowedCPUCount: Int
items.desc: The minimum number of CPUs you may configure for the VM.

items.name: class var maximumAllowedCPUCount: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of CPUs you may configure for the VM.

items.name: var memorySize: UInt64
items.desc: The amount of physical memory the guest operating system recognizes.

items.name: class var minimumAllowedMemorySize: UInt64
items.desc: The minimum amount of memory that you may configure for the VM.

items.name: class var maximumAllowedMemorySize: UInt64
items.desc: The maximum amount of memory that you may configure for the VM.

items.name: var memoryBalloonDevices: [VZMemoryBalloonDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: An array that you configure with a memory balloon device, used to update the memory in the VM.

items.name: var networkDevices: [VZNetworkDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The array of network devices that you expose to the guest operating system.

items.name: var socketDevices: [VZSocketDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The socket device that you use to implement port-based communication with the guest operating system.

items.name: var serialPorts: [VZSerialPortConfiguration]
items.desc: The array of serial ports that you expose to the guest operating system.

items.name: var storageDevices: [VZStorageDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The array of storage devices that you expose to the guest operating system.

items.name: var entropyDevices: [VZEntropyDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The array of randomization devices that you expose to the guest operating system.

items.name: var audioDevices: [VZAudioDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The list of audio devices.

items.name: var directorySharingDevices: [VZDirectorySharingDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The list of directory sharing devices.

items.name: var graphicsDevices: [VZGraphicsDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The list of graphics devices.

items.name: var keyboards: [VZKeyboardConfiguration]
items.desc: The list of keyboards.

items.name: var platform: VZPlatformConfiguration
items.desc: The hardware platform to use.

items.name: var pointingDevices: [VZPointingDeviceConfiguration]
items.desc: The list of pointing devices.

items.name: func validate()
items.desc: Validates the current configuration settings and reports any issues that might prevent the successful initialization of the VM.
